hero.tagline: The Hub of Arts and Culture
hero.title: Usmar Ismail
hero.subtitle: Hall

home_brief.desc: The PPHUI Building is more than just office space. It is a center of Indonesian film history located right in the heart of Kuningan's business district, Jakarta.

home_location.hub_addr: Jl. H. R. Rasuna Said No.Kav. C-22, Karet Kuningan, South Jakarta.

about.title: PPHUI Building
about.p1: Grade C Office Building in Jakarta's Golden Triangle. 5 storeys with 2,371 m² total area (avg 500 m² per floor).
about.p2: Facilities include 2 elevators (Passenger & Service), parking area, and prayer room (musholla) for your business comfort.

conference.title: Conference Room
conference.desc: Versatile spaces for corporate meetings and private seminars.

cinema.title: Mini Cinema
cinema.desc: Intimate screening room for film premieres and independent creators.

office.title: Office Space
office.desc: The H. Usmar Ismail Film Center Building location has very easy access by both private and public transportation.

virtual_office.title: Service & Virtual Office
virtual_office.desc: We offer Service Office and Virtual Office solutions available for daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly rental.

benefits.desc: Leverage a prestigious business domicile in Rasuna Said, Kuningan to enhance your company's credibility without high conventional office rental costs.
benefits.legal_desc: Valid business domicile in accordance with Government Regulations for NIB and PKP requirements.
benefits.mail_desc: Professional mail and package handling services for smooth operational flow.
benefits.location_desc: Business address in Kuningan, South Jakarta that elevates your brand's credibility.
benefits.flex_desc: Flexible daily to yearly options to adapt to your startup's growth needs.

location.title: Location & Access
location.desc: The location of the H. Usmar Ismail Film Center Building is highly strategic with primary accessibility in the heart of Jakarta's business district.
location.lrt: Kuningan LRT Station (Integrated with MRT, Busway, KRL)
location.quote: Supporting high mobility with easy access.

specs_values.facilities: 2 Elevators (1 Passenger, 1 Service), Parking Area, Prayer Room

gallery.title: Captured Moments
gallery.desc: A visual journey through the heritage and modern performances at Usmar Ismail Hall.

cta.title: Host Your Masterpiece At Our Venue
cta.subtitle: Elegance · Heritage · Prestige

footer.desc: The premier cultural venue in Jakarta, dedicated to the arts, cinema, and performance excellence since its establishment.

services.title: Integrated Solutions
services.hall_desc: Premier arts venue with world-class facilities for concerts, theater, and film screenings.
services.office_desc: Strategic office rentals in Jakarta's Golden Triangle with various size options.
services.virtual_desc: Flexible office solutions for startups and professionals needing a prestigious business address.

promotions.feb_desc: Celebrate the month of love with special offers for every venue and workspace booking in the heart of South Jakarta. Consult your needs now.
promotions.valid_desc: Limited time only. Book before 28 Feb 2026 to secure pricing.
promotions.eligibility_desc: Applies to Usmar Ismail Hall, Conference Rooms, and Virtual Offices.
promotions.how_to_desc: Mention "FEBPROMO26" when inquiring via WhatsApp or Contact Form.
